name: HubSpot Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 HubSpot Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume HubSpot API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume HubSpot API | (必填项)

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: apiKey

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: contact

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many tickets

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: properties (值: None) - Whether to include specific Ticket properties in the returned results. Choose from a list, or specify IDs using an expression. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

propertiesWithHistory (值: None) - Works similarly to properties=, but this parameter will include the history for the specified property, instead of just including the current value. Use this parameter when you need the full history of changes to a property's value.

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: properties (值: None) - Whether to include specific Company properties in the returned results. Choose from a list, or specify IDs using an expression. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

contactId.name: contactId
contactId.description: This is not a contact's email but a number like 1485
contactId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Contact to Delete | 作用: This is not a contact's email but a number like 1485 | 提示: To lookup a user by their email, use the Search operation | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

filterGroupsUi.name: filterGroupsUi
filterGroupsUi.description: When multiple filters are provided within a Filter Group, they will be combined using a logical AND operator. When multiple Filter Groups are provided, they will be combined using a logical OR operator. The system supports a maximum of three Filter Groups with up to three filters each. More info here
filterGroupsUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filter Groups | 作用: When multiple filters are provided within a Filter Group, they will be combined using a logical AND operator. When multiple Filter Groups are provided, they will be combined using a logical OR operator. The system supports a maximum of three Filter Groups with up to three filters each. More info here | 默认值: {}

by.name: by
by.natural_language_description: 参数名: By | 默认值: email | (必填项)

id.name: id
id.natural_language_description: 参数名: Contact to Remove | (必填项)

listId.name: listId
listId.natural_language_description: 参数名: List to Remove From | (必填项)

companyId.name: companyId
companyId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Company to Delete | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: associatedCompanyIds (值: None) - Whether to include specific Company properties in the returned results. Choose from a list, or specify IDs using an expression. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

associatedContactIds (值: None) - Whether to include specific Contact properties in the returned results. Choose from a list, or specify IDs using an expression. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.
category (值: None) - Main reason customer reached out for help. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
closeDate (值: None) - The date the ticket was closed. When using expressions, the time should be specified in YYYY-MM-DD hh-mm-ss format.
createDate (值: None) - The date the ticket was created. When using expressions, the time should be specified in YYYY-MM-DD hh-mm-ss format.
description (值: None) - Description of the ticket
pipelineId (值: None) - The ID of the pipeline the ticket is in. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
priority (值: None) - The level of attention needed on the ticket. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
resolution (值: None) - The action taken to resolve the ticket. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
source (值: None) - Channel where ticket was originally submitted. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
stageId (值: None) - The stage ID of the pipeline the ticket is in; depends on Pipeline ID. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

ticketOwnerId (值: None) - The user from your team that the ticket is assigned to. You can assign additional users to a ticket record by creating a custom HubSpot user property. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

domain.name: domain
domain.description: The company's website domain to search for, like n8n.io
domain.natural_language_description: 参数名: Domain | 作用: The company's website domain to search for, like n8n.io | (必填项)

stage.name: stage
stage.description: The deal stage is required when creating a deal. See the CRM Pipelines API for details on managing pipelines and stages. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
stage.natural_language_description: 参数名: Deal Stage Name or ID | 作用: The deal stage is required when creating a deal. See the CRM Pipelines API for details on managing pipelines and stages. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

dealId.name: dealId
dealId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Deal to Delete | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: since (值: None) - Only return deals created after timestamp x. When using expressions, the time should be specified in YYYY-MM-DD hh-mm-ss format.

includePropertyVersions (值: None) - By default, you will only get data for the most recent version of a property in the "versions" data. If you include this parameter, you will get data for all previous versions.

dueDate.name: dueDate
dueDate.description: The due date for the task
dueDate.natural_language_description: 参数名: Due Date | 作用: The due date for the task | (必填项)

metadata.name: metadata
metadata.natural_language_description: 参数名: Metadata | 默认值: {}

engagementId.name: engagementId
engagementId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Engagement to Delete | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

pipelineId.name: pipelineId
pipelineId.description: The ID of the pipeline the ticket is in. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
pipelineId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Pipeline Name or ID | 作用: The ID of the pipeline the ticket is in. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

stageId.name: stageId
stageId.description: The stage ID of the pipeline the ticket is in; depends on Pipeline ID. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
stageId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Stage Name or ID | 作用: The stage ID of the pipeline the ticket is in; depends on Pipeline ID. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

ticketName.name: ticketName
ticketName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Ticket Name | (必填项)

ticketId.name: ticketId
ticketId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Ticket to Delete | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)
